sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Notification = ({ text, type }) => { // type: [ success, alert, danger ] const style = { width: '500px', marginTop: '30px', borderRadius: '20px', padding: '20px', textAling: 'center' } if(type === 'success') style['backgroundColor'] = 'lightgreen' else if(type === 'alert') style['backgroundColor'] = 'yellow' else if(type === 'danger') style['backgroundColor'] = 'red' return ( <>
{ text }
) } export default Notification
